comment: Lemma for ~ lclkr . When ` B ` is zero, i.e. when ` X ` and ` Y ` are colinear, the intersection of the kernels of ` E ` and ` G ` equal the kernel of ` G ` , so the kernels of ` G ` and the sum are comparable. (Contributed by NM, 18-Jan-2015.)
